name: Dookie
description:
Dookie is a puzzle game where you control a white square to eat yellow energy pellets in order to unlock the green portal. The only problem is that the square can't eat another yellow pellet once it turns red. The only way to eat more is to poop. Be careful where you poop because poop can block the player's path.

Controls:
Arrow Keys -  to move in Left, Right, Up, Down direction.
Space - To poop when the player turns red
R - Reset the level
Esc - Quit the game

There are only 7 levels in the game.
